channel.title: Pk Point Exchange
channel.description: Hello Moparscapians, I've been off of the RSPS world for a while now, and I decided to have a fresh start and I made a new account, and started working on a new 317 source. I'm a bit rusty, and am wondering: [b]How do I make a shop with my PvP items cost [u]PK POINTS[/u] not coints[/b] my server of course has a pk point system, and now I'm just wanting to make them worth something. Best regards, David.

item.title: Pk Point Exchange
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Ah,

I use to do delta a long ass time ago.

I remember this isn’t a simple task as it is in PI

You have to completely redo how shops sell items,

Plenty of tuts on this though.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Point Exchange
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:8, topic:371688”][quote author=David The Drummer link=topic=467758.msg3420049#msg3420049 date=1291440045]

You’re on a Delta; I don’t know how to add this on a Delta server, I’m sure it’s easy, but I’ve never attempted before.

It’s the weirdest Delta I’ve ever seen then. When I say weirdest I mean cleanest. It’s in folders, has a cfg folder, a java folder, ect.
[/quote]
You can make a very good Delta with the proper coding; in fact, I’d like to see what source this is.
Could you tell me the name of it?[/quote]
I’ve edited it so much that I don’t even remember what it use to be called. Deathz I think?

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Point Exchange
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

I’ll just post some things and we’ll just do it from there. Ok, heres what I added to my client.java.

} else if (NPCID == 1921) { // Bartender PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 52; // PvP Shop
My shops.cfg.

shop = 52 PvP_Shop 2 2 8002 100 13665 100 8100 100 9802 100 9800 100 9801 100 9803 100 9804 100 9805 100 9807 100 9806 100 9810 100 9808 100 9809 100 9811 100 9812 100 9814 100 3627 100 3629 100 3631 100 3633 100 3635 100 3637 100 7608 100 7609 100 7613 100 9813 100 35 100 7617 100 16003 100 16004 100 16005 100
Now heres some things in my client.java that may be helpful, or may be pointless but I’ll post them none the less.

public int pkPoints = 0;

characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();
Man, you guys make me feel like a noob.

Read full topic
